outputs.output_descr: The project aims to transform the corporate ERP system from a transactional system to a strategic management tool by introducing business process enhancements in various functional areas.

project_descr: This project will enhance the following business processess in Atlas: 1)Procurement Integration; 2)Project Management; 3)Service Contracts; 4)Budgeting; 5)Financial Closing; 6) Corporate Reporting; 7)Atlas quality assurance; and 8)Travel.
